message:
Welcome to Regz Cheat!
Headshot and sniper should be safe in India server.
Other servers have some blacklist issues so test in small accounts first.
Updated headshot and sniper
Made aimbot stronger
Reduced fake damage
Added new aim position (chest shouldered)
Added some features like magic bullet, aimbot body, no recoil camera, fast switch (all weapons)
in experimental option. As you can see these features are risky and have ban chances. Only use
them in small accounts for rank push.
Please check client notice for more info.
